quest.name: A Taste of the Sea
journal:
Stigma-4 has received a new directive to spice things up at the café.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the alimentary survey unit.
Deliver the requested ingredients to the alimentary survey unit.
objectives: Speak with the alimentary survey unit.
Mine [Error] from the Elysian seas.Deliver [Error] to the alimentary survey unit.Gather [Error] from the Elysian seas.Catch [Error] from the Elysian seas.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: The furry café owner has proposed a plan to secure more customers─a reconfiguration of the food directory.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Specifically, the creation of a food item comprised of materials from the Elysian seas and suited to Karellian proclivities has been requested.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Your assistance is required. Please report to the alimentary survey unit for further instruction.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Provision supplier identified: Forename Surname. Loading entry for Karellian cuisine production...

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Based on data from Karellian survey, certain diatom clusters have been determined to optimize “delectable” quotient while also promoting healthy digestion.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Based on data from Karellian survey, certain rock moss has been determined to optimize “delectable” quotient while also promoting healthy digestion.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Based on data from Karellian survey, the aquatic organism colloquially referred to as “seaweed snapper” has been determined to optimize “delectable” quotient while also promoting healthy digestion.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Use of gold salmon roe is strongly recommended for procurement. All proceeds go to Omicron enhancement initiatives.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Please proceed to the marked area for acquisition. Prompt delivery is advised to ensure preservation of nutritional value.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text:
Loading directive... <whirr>
Please procure diatom clusters to optimize “delectable” quotient and promote healthy digestion.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text:
Loading directive... <whirr>
Please procure rock moss to optimize “delectable” quotient and promote healthy digestion.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text:
Loading directive... <whirr>
Please procure seaweed snapper to optimize “delectable” quotient and promote healthy digestion.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Prompt delivery is advised to ensure preservation of nutritional value. Please note that further delays may result in severe disappointment.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename Surname. Please insert delivery to continue.

dialogue.name: OMICRON04620
dialogue.text:
Scanning... <whirr> Scanning...
Quality of ingredients is acceptable. Delivery complete.
Please return to Stigma-4 to receive compensation.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return confirmed. Your timely delivery of goods has been noted and is greatly appreciated.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: This successful addition to the café's food directory should appease the fuzzy one for the time being.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: <beep> Warning: extensive diversification of food directory likely to result in logistical errors. Standardization of customer digestive organs advised as the most efficient solution.
